## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cdf3d7006b0b2cb524eb3e2fb401636a3a58bd02e1f9296ba89d576397b8831f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'os-apps-ui-traffic-manager' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
